text: The Flight in the Night (1987, ) is an Iranian film by the director Rasool Mollagholi Poor. A war movie set during the Iran-Iraq war, it belongs to the Sacred Defence genre. The movie won the Crystal Simorgh for Best Picture.IMDB ==References== category:Iranian films Category:1987 films Category:Persian- language films Category:Crystal Simorgh for Best Film winners
title: The Flight in the Night (1987 film)
